name: Myrne: Sobriquet
description:
Myrne: Sobriquet is a small but fun versus game for two players on the same keyboard.

Inspired by the physical game "Crossbows and Catapults" (aka "Battleground"), it's basically a two-players "Angry Birds" where each players tries to destroy/kill his opponent weapons/characters.

Sobriquet offers 6 different levels, usually with some twists, like a space level with low gravity.
